name: Captured King
description:
Welcome to Bear Island, you are the new jarl from here. Have been chosen
for the moast important mission of all:
Defeating monsters and beasts that maintain captives the King and his army.
Get ready for the battle colecting resources, crafting, exploring dungeons...
All is possible in Bear Island!

Follow Bjorn the Red in his jurney to rescue King Ivar and his army, in this new RPG with Roguelike elements.
Epic weapons, lots of different enemies , boss battles and diferents levels awaits you in Captured King.

Features.
  • Get epic weapons.
  • Defeat epic bosses!
  • Explore different biomes.
  • Challenging dungeons.
  • 8-bit Music.
  • Trading Cards, Steam Achievements and Emoticons.
  • Pixel art graphics.
  • Craft and improve items.
  • Get resources.

Enemies...




Music from Visagre
